title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Reflective Learning-Based Course for Enhancing Mathematical Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners acquire reflective journaling skills to systematically document their thinking processes during mathematical problem-solving activities
Learners enhance their ability to compare and integrate diverse problem-solving approaches through discussion-based tutorials with peer learners.
Learners apply reflective learning techniques to clearly define their learning objectives and develop improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
